attributes.action: OFFER HALF PRICE DIESEL TO TRUCK COMPANIES WHO AGREE TO ONLY TRAVEL BETWEEN 2000 AND 0600 BUT PAINT THEM IN YELLOW STRIPES SO NO CHEATING!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: By encouraging trucks to use the traffic free roads by night with the carrot of lower diesel prices we would free up a lot of road space during the working week days and reduce accidents.

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
